scripts.pub-win: npm run build && git checkout website && del /Q assets\* index.html vite.svg && xcopy /E /Y .\dist\* .\ && rmdir /S /Q dist && git add . && git commit -m "update website" && git push origin website
scripts.pub-linx: npm run build && git checkout website && rm -rf assets/* index.html vite.svg && cp -r dist/* . && rm -rf dist && git add . && git commit -m "update website" && git push origin website
